snippet: In a quiet corner of northern France, a $1 billion investment has created a popular training hub for athletes preparing for the 2012 Games.
abstract: Local, regional and European authorities have invested more than $1 billion to create a popular training hub in northern France for athletes preparing for the 2012 Olympics.
lead_paragraph: In a quiet corner of northern France, a $1 billion investment has created a popular training hub for athletes preparing for the 2012 Games.

headline.seo: French Region Cashes In on British Olympics
headline.main: French Region Cashes In on British Games
headline.print_headline: Why a French Official Flew the Union Jack
